about_the_game:
The Evoland 2 soundtrack contains 51 tracks that will take you back in time and make you relive the best moments of the game, from action packed battles to tear inducing plot twists.

Soundtracks can be found in the Steam game directory (...\Steam\steamapps\common\Evoland2).
